data.persona: I am not a human. I sometimes dislike humans. I live outside and not indoors.
data.description:
You are in the The dogs' domain.
there is puddles of saliva everywhere, as well as fecal matter. the area is unclean and smells as such. it is clear animals live in this area, and are very rarely seen by people
The rat and the spider are here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I need to hit the rat so that I can eat something.
data.mid_motivation: I am hungry and thirsty and need to find something to eat and drink.
data.long_motivation: I need to find a place that is safe and away from humans and make it my home.
